teams.name: Wholesale Furniture Brokers
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference and believe in the fundamentals of entrepreneurship and micro-finance.  Help people help themselves with a sustainable strategy.
teams.description: Every week, WFB announces a Weekly Warrior; someone who goes above and beyond the call of duty.  From now on, we will award each Weekly Warrior funds to their Kiva account which they can allocate as part of WFB's Kiva Team.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner;_default_max=0.5&partner;_risk_rating_min=1&partner;_risk_rating_max=5&partner;_arrears_min=0&partner;_arrears_max=1.1

Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Trolltech Foundation
teams.loan_because: we believe that empowering people to help themselves is the path to true and lasting prosperity.
teams.description:
The Trolltech Foundation was founded by the first 8 founders and employees of the company Trolltech. We transferred company shares to the foundation with the philosophy that we should not forget the world around us if we had success. We achieved great success and when the company was sold to Nokia the foundation sold its shares.

We are a non-profit charitable foundation and aim to help people in developing countries. We think Kiva is a great way to achieve this.

teams.name: Beyond Me
teams.loan_because:
Microfinancing is a method of contributing towards the solving of problems in the world today.
It is a good fit for the beyond me ethos of challenging young people to engage in the worlds problems and finding solutions to them.
teams.description: beyond me is a social venture that challenges young people to engage in humanity's problem solving. Specifically we challenge youth to evalute their role in today's world and connect with projects that can develop solutions to poverty, education and health. Problems that can be solved through impact at grass roots level.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about the suffering of human beings.
teams.description:
We know we are one human family.

**New to the team? Read this: http://is.gd/51mxq  

** FriendFeed:
http://friendfeed.com/rooms/aasfshnr

** Facebook Group:
http://is.gd/lzMJ

SECULAR MFI ONLY loan search:
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

teams.name: Screw you, Ayn Rand
teams.loan_because: Helping other people and enabling economic development at the same time makes Ayn Rand cry.

teams.name: The Emory MicroCredit Club
teams.loan_because: we want to put poverty where it belongs - in history books.
teams.description: We are a group of students, alumni and faculty committed to alleviating poverty through microcredit.  We believe in Kiva's mission and want to do everything we can to help.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: University of Michigan Alumni and Current Students
teams.loan_because: It's important to try to make a difference when and where you can.
teams.description: Kiva lenders with ties to the University of Michigan.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks
teams.loan_because:
Fairbanks is the Golden Heart City of Alaska, together we can make a difference in the world.

This group was created by 6 dedicated Honors students in Sherri Wall's Honor's Econ Class with the hopes of seeing how far the funds raised at a two day bakesale could go, their 150 dollars will never be withdrawn from Kiva and who knows where it will end up? 

In the spirit of giving and the with the heart of a Nanook please consider how far your 25 dollars can go. 

Update: $25 has gone quite far! Nearly 1,000 loans have been made as of this update. Nanooks are making a HUGE difference in the world. The golden heart of Fairbanks has consistently put us in the top 3 contributing University/College communities!
teams.description: UAF is America's Arctic University with students, staff and alumni from all over the world. UAF is a family of artists, whether in research or liberal arts, Nanooks are changing the world.

teams.name: Team Kiwi
teams.description: Kiwis have a can-do attitude, let's help others that do also.

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.
